Welcome to Personal Diary’s Documentation!¶

The Personal Diary is an application that allows users to create accounts for their own accounts for personal diaries. Users can then create, update and delete diary entries containing customized texts and images, as well as attach mood emojis to entries.

The following contains links to documentation on the modules found in the personal-diary directory:

App - the Python file containing code for Personal Diary’s Flask app.

Diary - the Python file containing the Diary class, representing the Personal Diary.

Diary User - the Python file containing the class with helper functions related to creating, reading, updating, and deleting a diary user.

Forms - the Python file with code for the form used for user to add a new entry to the diary by inputting a title and contents of the entry.

Models - the Python file with code for the data models used by the application.
